data.title: Experiences of Ramani Ayer: Current and past positions
meta_keywords: Chairman at Hartford Life & Accident Insurance Co.
data.meta_description: Find out more about Ramani Ayer's international, operational and industry experience. 17 positions known in addition to Chairman at Hartford Life & Accident Insurance Co.
data.text:
Multi-Line InsuranceFinance

Hartford Life and Accident Insurance Co. provides life insurance and investment products. It offers medical insurance, senior medical plans, group reinsurance, retirement programs, auto insurance, and property and casualty services. The company is headquartered in Simsbury, CT.

Hospital/Nursing ManagementHealth Services

Part of Cape Cod Healthcare, Inc., Falmouth Hospital Association, Inc. is a company that provides general medical and surgical hospital services. Falmouth Hospital Association, Inc. is based in Falmouth, MA.

Property/Casualty InsuranceFinance

Part of The Hartford Financial Services Group, Inc., Hartford Fire Insurance Co. is a property and casualty insurance company. The company is based in Hartford, CT.

Hospital/Nursing ManagementHealth Services

Hartford Hospital provides health care services. Its services include behavioral and health care, bone and joint, cancer care, cardiology and heart care, centers for surgical weight loss, diabetes and endocrinology, emergency services, neurosciences, physical rehabilitation, senior services, and women’s health. The company was founded in 1854 and is headquartered in Hartford, CT.

Multi-Line InsuranceFinance

XL Group Plc is a global insurance and reinsurance company. It provides property, casualty and specialty products to industrial, commercial and professional firms, insurance companies and other enterprises. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in St. Stephen's Green, Ireland.

Life/Health InsuranceFinance

Talcott Resolution Life, Inc. provides life insurance services. The firm specializes in property and casualty insurance, mutual funds and group benefits. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hartford, CT.

Multi-Line InsuranceFinance

Hartford Life and Accident Insurance Co. provides life insurance and investment products. It offers medical insurance, senior medical plans, group reinsurance, retirement programs, auto insurance, and property and casualty services. The company is headquartered in Simsbury, CT.

Property/Casualty InsuranceFinance

Part of The Hartford Financial Services Group, Inc., Hartford Fire Insurance Co. is a property and casualty insurance company. The company is based in Hartford, CT.

Hospital/Nursing ManagementHealth Services

Hartford Hospital provides health care services. Its services include behavioral and health care, bone and joint, cancer care, cardiology and heart care, centers for surgical weight loss, diabetes and endocrinology, emergency services, neurosciences, physical rehabilitation, senior services, and women’s health. The company was founded in 1854 and is headquartered in Hartford, CT.

Multi-Line InsuranceFinance

XL Group Plc is a global insurance and reinsurance company. It provides property, casualty and specialty products to industrial, commercial and professional firms, insurance companies and other enterprises. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in St. Stephen's Green, Ireland.

Insurance Brokers/ServicesFinance

American Insurance Association, Inc. offers casualty insurance, including personal and commercial auto insurance, commercial property and liability coverage, workers compensation, homeowners, medical malpractice coverage, and product liability insurance. The company has operations in Albany, Boston, Chicago, Albany, Atlanta, and Sacramento. It was founded by Robert Vagley in 1990 and is located in Washington, DC.

Medical/Nursing ServicesHealth Services

Hartford HealthCare Corp. provides healthcare services. It offers behavioral and mental health, bone and joint, cancer care, cardiology and heart care, centers for surgical weight loss, diabetes and endocrinology, emergency services, neurosciences, pain treatment, physical rehabilitation, senior services, and women's health. The company was founded in 1854 and is headquartered in Hartford, CT.

Internet Software/ServicesTechnology Services

Insurance Services Office, Inc. provides data and analytic information about risk management. It provides data, analytics and decision-support solutions to professionals, includes insurance, finance, real estate, health services, government and human resources. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jersey City, NJ.

Multi-Line InsuranceFinance

XL Group Ltd. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of general insurance services. It operates through the Insurance and Reinsurance segments. The Insurance segment provides commercial property, casualty, and specialty insurance products on a global basis. The Reinsurance segment includes casualty, property risk, property catastrophe, specialty, and other reinsurance lines on a global basis with business being written on both a proportional and non-proportional treaty basis. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.
